name: Cryogonal
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at -148° F.

attacks.name: Call Sign
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a {W} Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Cryofreeze
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. The Defending Pokémon can’t attack during your opponent’s next turn.
